description: Adds a content-length check for the stream returned from `createReadStream()`, and the stream will emit an error when the bytes received are fewer than specified by the response content-length header.

Reverts behavior introduced in version `2.4.0` of the SDK to default the `signatureVersion` of S3 clients to `v4`. S3 clients instantiated without a user-defined `signatureVersion` will now default to `v2` unless the region only supports `v4` signing. This change is being made due to issues sending non-ascii characters in headers when using `v4` signing.
Adds `listOutgoingCertificates` and support for allowing autoregistration.
Adds compute time and entity timestamp to multiple operations.
Support for license model and versioning of option groups.
Adds new APIs to renew domains for a specified duration, get domain suggestions, and view billing.
